chat_10530.content: I dare you to drink the entire bottle of tequila.

option_10009.scene_content: INT. PRIVATE STUDY ROOM TABLE - DAY

chat_10531.content: Are you trying to out-man me?

chat_10409.content: Unbeknownst to me, ${1009} had been listening to the entire conversation.

chat_10406.content: I actually heard he was gay.

chat_10407.content: Really? Damn it, I'm never going to get my deposit back on that wedding dress.

chat_10525.content: ${1017} tapped on a glass and got everyone's attention.

chat_10523.content: I remember when he used to laugh with me like that.

chat_10402.content: Do you think you can introduce me to him?

chat_10524.content: He laughed AT you, not with you. There's a difference.

chat_10521.content: Wow, look at him laughing like that.

chat_10522.content: I can't remember seeing him be so happy before. He must really like her.

chat_10520.content: ${1009} chuckles and ${1003} looked across at us from the other side of the room.

chat_10558.content: ${1009} entered the room looking for ${1005}, only to find ${1012} standing there alone...in her lingerie.

chat_10316.content: Later that day, when the math test was over, I saw ${1009} in the hallway.

chat_10314.content: You can teach me maths, and I can teach you partying. Deal?

chat_10557.content: So, you're totally in love right? Have you done it yet?

chat_10433.content: Time to experience your first party.

chat_10555.content: ${1009} left the room to find ${1005}, leaving me hanging.

chat_10434.content: Oh my God, you guys! You two are the cutest couple!

chat_10313.content: It'll be fine, I'll walk you through it.

chat_10431.content: Not unless the tacos had tequila in them, I thought to myself.

chat_10432.content: People were partying as ${1009} and I walked in.

chat_10551.content: I've been looking all over for you. Have you been doing shots...

chat_10309.content: We mostly just chill and watch Harry Potter movies.

chat_10549.content: Apparently nerves, excitement and alcohol aren't the best mix. With my eyes closed, I leaned forwards.

chat_10428.content: ${1009} paused to think. Ugh, what am I saying?!

chat_10307.content: Come on, don't be like that.

chat_10429.content: Did you already have a drink on the way?! I like your style.

chat_10308.content: What do you even do at parties?

chat_10548.content: I edged towards him, my heart in my throat. I was so excited but at the same time, I was doing my best not to vomit.

chat_10427.content: Why? Are you into princesses? I can be a princess if you want.

chat_10306.content: I'm not sure if I even wanna go.

chat_10545.content: They are the rules of truth or dare.

chat_10425.content: Hell yeah! I have to be back by midnight though.

chat_10304.content: Uhm, did I say that out loud?

chat_10543.content: Despite the alcohol hazing my mind, I was still very aware of what was going on.

chat_10544.content: Was this really going to be my first kiss with ${1009}? I looked over at him to see if he was as nervous as I was.

chat_10423.content: Well, duh. I have mirrors in my house, you know.

chat_10421.content: What is it? Do I have something on my face? I knew I shouldn't have gone to Taco Bell on the way...

chat_10300.content: Not that that would be a problem for you, ${1009}.

chat_10604.content: Ignoring the begging ${1012}'s crying, ${1009} storms out of the room...

chat_10602.content: Get away from me, ${1012}. We're through, get that into your thick skull.

chat_10603.content: I have to find ${1015}, she's too drunk to be alone.

chat_10600.content: What the hell is your problem?!

chat_10601.content: I'm love sick, baby. I need you back in my life.

chat_10518.content: Don't you wanna look for a little longer?

chat_10514.content: Can you just put your shirt back on please?

chat_10512.content: Shit, I said it out loud!

chat_10513.content: Shit, I just said that out loud too.

chat_10509.content: ${1009} pulled off his shirt and I couldn't help but stare.

chat_10507.content: Shit, I spilled it on your shirt!

chat_10508.content: Relax, I'll just soap it in the sink.

chat_10503.content: I think I'm drunk. You can't stop doing shots until you've got it right.

chat_10501.content: Okay, so it's lime, salt, tequila.

chat_10500.content: And that's how to do a shot.
